mapper.select: SELECT id AS "id", icon AS "icon", component, name AS "name", permission AS "permission", remark AS "remark", sort AS "sort", type AS "type", value AS "value", fk_parent_id AS "fkParentId" FROM tb_resource WHERE fk_parent_id = #{id}

SELECT id AS "id", icon AS "icon", component, name AS "name", permission AS "permission", remark AS "remark", sort AS "sort", type AS "type", value AS "value", fk_parent_id AS "fkParentId" FROM tb_resource
WHERE id NOT IN
#{id}
order by sort ASC

SELECT r.id AS "id", r.icon AS "icon", r.name AS "name", r.component, r.permission AS "permission", r.remark AS "remark", r.sort AS "sort", r.type AS "type", r.value AS "value", r.fk_parent_id AS "fkParentId" FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_group_resource gr ON gr.fk_resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON gr.fk_group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tb_group_user gu ON gu.fk_group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON gu.fk_user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY r.id ORDER BY r.sort

SELECT r.id AS "id", r.icon AS "icon", r.name AS "name", r.component, r.permission AS "permission", r.remark AS "remark", r.sort AS "sort", r.type AS "type", r.value AS "value", r.fk_parent_id AS "fkParentId" FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_group_resource gr ON gr.fk_resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON gr.fk_group_id = g.id WHERE g.id = #{groupId}

select tr.*,IF(tgr.fk_group_id is null,0,1) checked, (select count(1) from tb_resource where fk_parent_id = tr.id) leafCount from tb_resource tr left join (select fk_resource_id, fk_group_id from tb_group_resource where fk_group_id = #{groupId}) tgr on tr.id = tgr.fk_resource_id
